name: KidsNews
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Kids News provides fun entertaining daily current events, science and other types of news for children of all ages! News is updated daily. Kids News updates are short and fun and meant to be educational and/or inspiring. 

Here's an example of one of the daily Kids News snippets:

"ZOO GETS AN ADORABLE HOLIDAY PRESENT - The Potter Park Zoo in Michigan welcomed a new baby on Christmas Eve. A black rhino calf was born! Only around 5,500 black rhinos exist in the wild. The calf’s parents are Doppsee and Phineus, but the baby isn’t named yet. Black rhinos and white rhinos are both gray. They just have different lip shapes!"

We hope you and your children enjoy it and learn fun facts, science, art, current events and more!!

The news is read by Alexa, so it will be a friendly voice for kids.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
